      • build

        public IJSApplication build(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Description copied from interface: IJSTarget
        Build the target JavaScript application and collect problems. Every time the method is called, a new IJSApplication model is created.
        Specified by:
        build in interface IJSTarget
        Parameters:
        problems - compilation problems output
        Returns:
        IJSApplication if build is a success.
